Key Match Events: Faisal Mansour Ali Saleh Al Badri scored a penalty in the 9th minute to give Libya the lead
Steve Mouine equalized for Benin Republic in the 50th minute
Junior Olaitan scored a penalty in the 62nd minute to give Benin Republic the lead
Post-Match Reflections: This victory helped Benin Republic recover from their 1-0 loss to Nigeria and move into second place in Group D
Libya, with a draw and a loss, now sit at the bottom of the group
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Benin Republic's second AFCON 2025 Group D qualifier
Others: The Cheetahs of Benin Republic secured a crucial 2-1 victory over Libya
Junior Olaitan was a standout performer for Benin Republic
Libya will face Nigeria in a home-and-away series in the next international break
